comment: Robinson is a nice teacher and very knowledgable. However, he is easily distracted and assigns bigger projects with a short amount of time to complete them.
rating_tags: Respected--Graded by few things--So many papers

comment: Robinson gives a lot of work and its all fairly involved. If you're looking for an easy-A this is not the class to take. He's a tough grader, but very nice and always willing to help. You need the textbook in the beginning of the semester, but won't use it again. BEWARE of huge group project at the end of semester. Bottomline: lots of work!
Hardest grader I have ever had. Gives multiple projects at once. No clarity. Gives last-minute midterms with one-day's notice. Do NOT take his seminar class.

Takes this class ridiculously seriously compared to any other professor that teaches it, I would definitely avoid him if you know what's good for you.  Even if you put as much effort as he demands he is a very harsh grader.  Attendance is also mandatory.  Not a fun semester.
Not a good professor to have for this class. If you just want to get this course over with, do not take Robinson.  He assigns a ton of work and doesn't seem to know exactly what he's doing.
HE makes everything so clear and easy to understand. He is very cool
